name: Warp Dash Pro Edition
description:
Warp Dash is a side scrolling space shoot-em-up where your ultimate goal is to survive the onslaught of UFOs coming your way. Obliterate BUFOs, dodge and weave around GUFOs, duck under the return fire of RUFOs, chase down YUFOs, watch your back for OUFOs, and BEWARE OF PUFOs! Just don't let any of them get past you.

Features:

-30 Playable Levels

-Tutorial Level

- Unlockable Endless Mode

-Unlockable Custom Mode

-Shop with upgrades

-Large range of difficulty

-Lots of enemies

-Full Boss Fights

Features that are new with the payed version include:

-Cosmetics, including ship skins and customizable laser color.

-Improved menu configuration

-Tracking for custom mode record scores

-10 new CHAOS LEVELS, which are extremely difficult, allow use of upgrades, and have major rewards

-New level pass system that allows you to skip certain levels of the main level set

-Lucky Spin, where you can earn coins, level passes, upgrades, weapons, cosmetics, or gamble your money away.

-Improved graphics and minor bug fixes
